text: Atlantis () is a 2019 Ukrainian dystopian post-apocalyptic film directed by Valentyn Vasyanovych. It was screened in the Contemporary World Cinema section at the 2019 Toronto International Film Festival. At the 76th Venice International Film Festival, the film won the award for Best Film in the Horizons section. It was selected as the Ukrainian entry for the Best International Feature Film at the 93rd Academy Awards. ==Synopsis== In an environmentally devastated and war-torn eastern Ukraine, a retired soldier loses his job at a smelter. His new job is exhuming corpses. ==References== ==See also== * List of submissions to the 93rd Academy Awards for Best International Feature Film * List of Ukrainian submissions for the Academy Award for Best International Feature Film ==External links== * Category:2019 films Category:2019 drama films Category:Ukrainian films Category:Ukrainian drama films Category:Ukrainian-language films Category:Dystopian films Category:Post-apocalyptic films
title: Atlantis (2019 film)
